original_text: The young woman was very beautiful. She had not had sex with any man. She went down to the well. She filled her pot with water and she came back up again.
korean_text: 그 소녀는 보기에 심히 아리땁고 지금까지 남자가 가까이 하지 아니한 처녀더라 그가 우물로 내려가서 물을 그 물동이에 채워가지고 올라오는지라

sentences.original_text: The young woman was very beautiful
She had not had sex with any man
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 어떤 남자와도 성관계를 한 적이 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: She went down to the well
She filled her pot with water
